msg.titl: Company has ceased to exist or is in liquidation.

msg.name: creditcheck.unknown
msg.titl: Creditworthiness of company unknown.

msg.name: creditcheck.warning
msg.titl: Information is available about the facts or changes in the company that may (but do not necessarily have) impact on creditworthiness of company.

msg.name: creditcheck.problem
msg.titl: Information is available that likelyl has a negative impact on the creditworthienss of the company.

msg.name: chybnyVlastniKurzChybiKurz

msg.name: parseParameterNumberError
msg.titl: Parameter %p requires a number, but this is entered: %p.

msg.name: parseParameterValueError
msg.titl: ###V parametru %p očekávána jedna z hodnot (%p), ale nalezeno '%p'.

msg.name: parseParameterMesicError
msg.titl: In the %p parameter, the number of month (1-12) or quarter (Q1-Q4) is expected, but '%p' is found.

msg.name: parametrPovinny
msg.titl: Parameter %p is required.

msg.name: neexistujeReport
msg.titl: There is no report

msg.name: missing_param_exception
msg.titl: Parameter ‘%p’ is required to perform the operation

msg.name: illegal_parameter_exception
msg.titl: Parameter ‘%p’ is expected in ‘%p’ format.

msg.name: illegal_argument_exception_not_active_property

msg.name: error_parsing_file_exception

msg.name: resource_not_found_exception
msg.titl: ##The necessary ‘%p’ resource was not found

msg.name: unsupported_param_value_exception
msg.titl: Parameter ‘%p’ has an unsupported value! Select one of the following options: %p

msg.name: incompatible_param_values_exception
msg.titl: Values of parameters %p are not compatible

msg.name: error.not_sha1_hash
msg.titl: This is not in valid SHA1 stamp format. It should have 20 hexa bytes of divided by colons.

msg.name: error.tooManyRequests
msg.titl: This company is currently processing a large number of previous requests, please wait.

lb.name: root.version
lb.titl: Version

lb.name: root.explanation
lb.titl: ABRA Flexi js a modern accounting and management system competent for the quality processing of accounting and related agendas for a broad spectrum of companies. Hidden behind an easy-to-use user interfaceis a robust and powerful client - server application that can be run on Windows, Linux and Mac OS X. Economic systems produced by ABRA Flexi been on the market since 1991

lb.name: devdoc.slevaDokl
lb.titl: Total discount for document applied to resulting price.

lb.name: devdoc.bezPolozek
lb.titl: Does this document contain items? If it does, amount is determined by their sum. Otherwise, it is possible to set amount directly (sumCelkSniz etc.)

lb.name: devdoc.datUhr
lb.titl: Date of payment. Filled when the document was paid.

lb.name: devdoc.sumOsv
lb.titl: Total sum of bases exempt from VAT in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklSniz
lb.titl: Total sum of bases with reduced VAT in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklZakl
lb.titl: Total sum of bases exempt from VAT in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklCelkem
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the company's base currency. This is the resulting amount not including VAT. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphSniz
lb.titl: The total amount of VAT at a reduced rate of VAT in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphZakl
lb.titl: Total amount of VAT at the basic rate in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphCelkem
lb.titl: Total amount of VAT (sum of reduced and basic rate) in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkem
lb.titl: Total sum including VAT in the company's base currency. (i.e. how much the customer should pay). If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkSniz
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases at the reduced VAT rate (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkZakl
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases a the basic rate of VAT (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the company's base currency. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumOsvMen
lb.titl: Total sum of bases exempt from VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklSnizMen
lb.titl: Total sum of bases with reduced VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklZaklMen
lb.titl: Total sum of bases with basic VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumZklCelkemMen
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. This is the resulting amount not including VAT. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphSnizMen
lb.titl: The total amount of VAT at a reduced rate of VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphZaklMen
lb.titl: The total amount of VAT at the basic rate of VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumDphCelkemMen
lb.titl: Total amount of VAT (sum of reduced and basic rate) in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkemMen
lb.titl: Total sum including VAT in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. (i.e. how much the customer should pay). If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkSnizMen
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases at the reduced VAT rate (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.sumCelkZaklMen
lb.titl: Total sum of all bases at the basic VAT rate (i.e. amount not including VAT) in the document currency. If the currency of the document is identical to the company's base currency, this item is zero value. If the document is itemised it is automatically figured from items.

lb.name: devdoc.dphSnizKoef
lb.titl: Was the coefficient for VAT calculation used in calculation of reduced VAT? (pursuant to Section 37 of the VAT Act). It influences checksums.

lb.name: devdoc.dphZaklKoef
lb.titl: Was the coefficient for VAT calculation used in calculation of basic VAT? (pursuant to Section 37 of the VAT Act). It influences checksums.

lb.name: devdoc.kurz
lb.titl: Rate, which is determines the conversion between the company's currency and the document currency. If the currency is not filled in, it has a zero value.

lb.name: devdoc.kurzMnozstvi
lb.titl: Exchange amount, which defines the relationship between the company's base currency and the document currency. E.g. the rate between the Czech crown and the Japanese yen is determined as CZK 1: JPY 100.

lb.name: devdoc.firma
lb.titl: Link to company in directory. If not completed, then items should be completed with detailed information about the company.

lb.name: devdoc.nazFirmy
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.ulice
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.mesto
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.psc
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.eanKod
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.faNazev
lb.titl: Postal address. Fill in only if postovniShodna is false. If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.faUlice
lb.titl: Postal address. Fill in only if postovniShodna is false. If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.faMesto
lb.titl: Postal address. Fill in only if postovniShodna is false. If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.faPsc
lb.titl: Postal address. Fill in only if postovniShodna is false. If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.faEanKod
lb.titl: Postal address. Fill in only if postovniShodna is false. If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.ic
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.dic
lb.titl: If the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.postovniShodna
lb.titl: If it is true, that postal address = invoice address. if the item 'company' is filled in, it is not necessary to add additional information as the information will be copied form the address book.

lb.name: devdoc.evidenceFilter
lb.titl: Database filter:

lb.name: zalohaProgressDownloadTitle
lb.titl: Advance will be available for download in a moment..

lb.name: authn.type.INTERNAL.description
lb.titl: Only the name and password stored in ABRA Flexi is used.

lb.name: authn.type.GOOGLE.description
lb.titl: Authorization is performed against Google servers. Both paid and free variants of Google Apps can be used.

lb.name: authn.type.IT_HIGHWAY.description
lb.titl: Authorization via a network of integrated services IT Highway.

lb.name: authn.type.UCTUJTE.description
lb.titl: Special authentication on the web <tt>uctujte.cz</tt>.

lb.name: authn.type.OPENID.description
lb.titl: Authorization is performed against a regular OpenID provider. Configuration will need to be done.

lb.name: authn.type.SAML.description
lb.titl: Authorization is performed against a regular SAMLv2 Identity Provider. Configuration will need to be done.

lb.name: authn.password_quality
lb.titl: Required password quality

lb.name: authn.sso_login_url
lb.titl: Logon URL for SSO

lb.name: authn.sso_login_url.description
lb.titl: URL to which ABRA Flexi (service) will send requests for user authentication. The request contains all necessary details for performing authentication, but it is often still necessary to create configuration on the ID provider’s side for the particular service. It is often necessary to specify the URL for processing a response and certain other parameters of the authentication protocol:

lb.name: authn.sso_logout_url
lb.titl: Logoff URL for SSO

lb.name: authn.sso_chng_passwd_url
lb.titl: URL for SSO password change

lb.name: authn.sso_chng_passwd_url.description
lb.titl: URL to which it will be possible to redirect users for the purpose of central logoff or change of password for the ID provider.

lb.name: authn.service_provider_id
lb.titl: Service Provider identifier

lb.name: authn.service_provider_id.description
lb.titl: Service provider identifier, who figures as the party requesting user authentication. Typically a second class domain (e.g. tt>flexibee.eu).

lb.name: authn.sso_cert_fingerprint
lb.titl: Certificate stamp <abbr title="Identity Provider">IDP</abbr>

lb.name: authn.sso_cert_fingerprint.description
lb.titl:
Here the SHA1 certificate stamp is entered, which will be used to sign responses. The correct format can be obtained, for example, via the command: openssl x509 -noout -in cert.pem -fingerprint -sha1
Leave empty if the certificate validation is not supposed to be done.

lb.name: authn.idp_settings.response_consumer_url
lb.titl: URL for receipt of a response

lb.name: authn.idp_settings.single_logout_url
lb.titl: URL for user logoff

lb.name: authn.idp_settings.name_id_format
lb.titl: User identifier format

lb.name: authn.ACCESS_CONTROL_ALLOW_ORIGIN
lb.titl: Network access to ABRA Flexi data

lb.name: authn.ACCESS_CONTROL_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description
lb.titl: Influences HTTP header configuration Access-Control-Allow-Origin (domains separated by a space)

lb.name: settings.ITH_USERS_MANAGEMENT
lb.titl: "IT Highway” user administration

lb.name: settings.ITH_USERS_MANAGEMENT.description
lb.titl: Limits assignment of roles in the application ADMIN and changing of user details. User administration is done primarily via Batch API.

lb.name: typKurzu.uhrady
lb.titl: Exchange rate by payment date

lb.name: typKurzu.faktury
lb.titl: Exchange rate obtained from invoice

lb.name: typKurzu.vlastni
lb.titl: Own exchange rate

lb.name: newInterfaceLink
lb.titl: Try the new interface
